name: webtalekit
description: Web知識でノベルゲーを作ることを目指したやつ

scripts.play: rm -rf ./dist/ && webpack --mode development && cp -r test/* dist/ && npx webpack-dev-server --open --mode development
scripts.dev: rm -rf ./dist/ && webpack --mode development && cp -r test/* dist/ && npx webpack-dev-server --mode development
scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist/ && webpack --mode development && cp -r test/* dist/

author: EndoHizumi
